{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Floral Whisper|It|Floral Whisper}} is open from 06:00 – 19:00, and the owner, [[Flora]], sells 5 different flowers in exchange for [[Mora]].</p>}}

Her stock resets every 3 days, but the flowers she offers do not change.

==Shop==
{{Vendor|Flora}}

==Trivia==
* If you try touching any of the flowers during daytime, Flora will admonish you, saying that they are for sale. At nighttime, [[Donna]] will admonish you in Flora's place.
